channel.title: Unholy Lotus 317 Best RSPS This time! NEED STAFF
channel.description:
UNHOLY LOTUS 317 VPS
Unholy lotus is,
A very great server you can choose your own way. Skiller? Pker? Pure? Main? Its your choose u can train it! Unholy lotus has a donator system and very pretty items and also a great rank.
So where u waiting for? Join Unholy lotus NOW!
Download link: http://www.mediafire.com/download/g7w5lt15uotenuf/NEW_UNHOLY_LOTUS_CLIENT!.zip <--- Direct Download! :D
Features
Grand Exchange Flawless party room Lottery Dicing Multiple world support Cross-world player list support Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently) Flawless duel arena, with staking Flawless shopping system Flawless banking system, with searching. Flawless farming system PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc Rank Icon changing system Flawless loyalty title system Flawless donator system Refined item definition system New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc. Event schedule system New character file system (credits to Lin for the format) Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally) Perfect curse system Weapon combination selection in duel arena Advanced MySQL system Special client ::brony mode :)
And much, much more.
http://unholylotus.proboards.com/ <--- sign up for forums here and download client!
http://www.mediafire.com/download/g7w5lt15uotenuf/NEW_UNHOLY_LOTUS_CLIENT!.zip <--- Direct Download! :D
